What I Do

100% Hand Coded

Unlike page-builders that produce bloated code and slow down your site, I hand-write each line of code to maximize efficiency at run time.

Site Optimization

Utilizing human centered design tactics, I improve site performance whilst satisfying the underlying needs of users.

Usability & Accessability

My websites are built with assistive technologies in mind to make the web a more user-friendly and accessible place for all users.
